nominalLoad.description: The maximum load that the equipment is designed to handle under normal operating conditions?

locationId.description: Unique identifier for the location where the equipment is installed

coolingType.description: The method used to cool the equipment (e.g., ONAF1, ONAN)

manufactureYear.description: The year the equipment was manufactured?

commissioningDate.description: The date when the equipment was put into service?

enclosure.description: The type of enclosure isolating? the equipment (e.g., 4walls, 1wall)

heatRunTest_noLoadLosses.description: Iron (core) losses of the transformer measured during the heat run test under no-load conditions.

heatRunTest_copperLosses.description: Load (I²R) losses in the transformer windings during the heat run test at rated current.

heatRunTest_ambiantTemperature.description: Ambient temperature around the transformer during the heat run test, used as the reference for temperature rise.

heatRunTest_deltaTopOil.description: Temperature rise of the top oil over ambient temperature at steady state during the heat run test.

heatRunTest_deltaHotspot.description: Temperature rise of the winding hot-spot over ambient temperature, derived from resistance measurements, during the heat run test.

heatRunTest_x.description: Exponent x in the transformer thermal model (typically oil exponent, ~0.8).

heatRunTest_y.description: Exponent y in the transformer thermal model (typically winding exponent, ~1.3).

heatRunTest_h.description: Dimensionless exponent used in the thermal model for transformer hot-spot or top-oil temperature calculation (typically between 1.0 and 1.5).

heatRunTest_gradient.description: Gradient between winding hot-spot temperature and top oil temperature at rated load during the heat run test ?

dateTime.description: The date and time when the measurement was taken

load.description: Energy load on the equipment at the time of measurement?

hotspotTemperature.description: The temperature at the hottest point in the equipment?

temperature.description: The ambient temperature at the time of measurement

windSpeed.description: The speed of wind at the location of the equipment?

relativeHumidityPercentage.description: The relative humidity at the location of the equipment

city.description: The city where the equipment is located
